    • Method Detail

      • extractRandomIMDBIDFromTop250Movies

        public java.lang.String extractRandomIMDBIDFromTop250Movies()
                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Generates a random number and, based on that number, goes to http://www.imdb.com/chart/top and captures the corresponding IMDBId. Used to capture the IMDBId of movies that are known to the public.
        Returns:
        String imdbID
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error related to the webscraping performed by Jsoup

      • findMovieOnOMDBApi

        public Movie findMovieOnOMDBApi()
        Access OMDBApi and return Movie object populated based on ImdbID of random movies found in IMDB Top 250
        Returns:
        Movie Movie

      • movieIsValid

        public boolean movieIsValid​(Movie movie)
        Checks if movie is valid or not based on rating and votes informations.
        Parameters:
        movie - Movie
        Returns:
        Boolean true if movie is valid, otherwise false.
